comments.text:
I have had the same problem since upgrading to FF4. Yesterday I noticed that the scrolling stops working if any open tab has application context. 

After some more investigation I found out that the application "eats" the scrolling events thus the scroll events happen in the application.

I verified this by:
1 open a webpage that scroll works on 
2 open a pdf (that is large enough to need scrolling) in second tab
3 switch to the first tab and try to scroll down
4 switch to second tab and voila the pdf has scrolled down

Hope this bug can be fixed soon, it is really annoying.
